originalText.text: Laurie is a fantastic photographer! She is easy to work with, knows how to identify your most flattering angles and takes great photos. If you are a seasoned (older) person like myself... you should know that Laurie does expert photo retouching :-)

text.text: Laurie is a fantastic photographer! She is easy to work with, knows how to identify your most flattering angles and takes great photos. If you are a seasoned (older) person like myself... you should know that Laurie does expert photo retouching :-)

originalText.text: Laurie is simply the best. During our first meeting with her, Laurie answered all of our questions, with such humor, empathy, and professionalism that we knew right away that we wanted her as our photographer. Even though it was not part of the deal, Laurie met up with the wedding party for a rehearsal in Central Park and then followed us to take some pictures at our rehearsal dinner. The pictures she took of the wedding ceremony and the reception were stunning. They made me laugh and cry all over again by taking me back to the very best day of my life.

text.text: Laurie is simply the best. During our first meeting with her, Laurie answered all of our questions, with such humor, empathy, and professionalism that we knew right away that we wanted her as our photographer. Even though it was not part of the deal, Laurie met up with the wedding party for a rehearsal in Central Park and then followed us to take some pictures at our rehearsal dinner. The pictures she took of the wedding ceremony and the reception were stunning. They made me laugh and cry all over again by taking me back to the very best day of my life.

originalText.text:
Laurie Rhodes tackles everything in much the same manner…. with gusto and a real yearning to do the best job possible. I had always noticed the photos she took which adorned the walls of her office at Paramount where she and I had worked together. When she decided to leave her job as an executive at Paramount and pursue photography as her means of livelihood, I had no doubt that she would be a success at that as well as in the entertainment industry. I hired her to shoot my wedding in 1998 and the photos turned out fabulously.
If you know me well, you’d know that I almost never like photos of myself :-O and I am a perfectionist. Well, I was extremely happy with the results. Laurie’s style of documentary shooting is just stunning in her ability to capture a moment, a thought, and an essence in a single photo. She truly loves her work and it shows in the way she interacts with people whether from behind the camera or on the street. I recommend Laurie’s work wholeheartedly! The funniest thing is that the folks who hire Laurie to shoot their weddings, end up hiring her again to shoot their babies photos in a year or two following the wedding! —Judy

originalText.text: We hired Laurie to shoot our wedding and we absolutely love the pictures! Whenever we look at them, she takes us right back to each moment of that special day. She has great instinct, an incredible eye, she's so easy to work with, and she's unobtrusive while still managing to capture everything and be everywhere she needs to be on your big day!

text.text: We hired Laurie to shoot our wedding and we absolutely love the pictures! Whenever we look at them, she takes us right back to each moment of that special day. She has great instinct, an incredible eye, she's so easy to work with, and she's unobtrusive while still managing to capture everything and be everywhere she needs to be on your big day!

originalText.text: Laurie was a sweet, wonderful and calm photographer. She captured lovely and fun pictures for our family portrait and baby pictures that were candid and really showed our personalities. I greatly appreciated her skills and talent. We will definitely use her again for our next portrait.
